title: How to Make a Toasted Macaroni and Cheese Sandwich

steps.headline: Preheat the stovetop to medium heat.
steps.description: Place a frying pan onto a stovetop and spread butter over the frying pan.

steps.headline: Make the macaroni and cheese.
steps.description: Follow your recipe's instructions to make the macaroni and cheese. Set aside to cool until warm.

steps.headline: Spread the butter on the sandwich bread pieces.
Lay a slice of cheese onto each each piece of bread.
Add the macaroni and cheese over each piece of bread.
steps.description: Close the bread pieces together, making two sandwiches.

steps.headline: Grill the sandwiches.
steps.description: Place the sandwiches on the frying pan. Grill on both sides for about 2-3 minutes, until the sandwiches golden brown and the cheese melts.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Place the sandwiches on a serving plate. Cut into pieces, if desired. Enjoy!

text: Preheat the stovetop to medium heat. Place a frying pan onto a stovetop and spread butter over the frying pan. Make the macaroni and cheese. Follow your recipe's instructions to make the macaroni and cheese. Set aside to cool until warm. Spread the butter on the sandwich bread pieces.  Lay a slice of cheese onto each each piece of bread.  Add the macaroni and cheese over each piece of bread. Close the bread pieces together, making two sandwiches. Grill the sandwiches. Place the sandwiches on the frying pan. Grill on both sides for about 2-3 minutes, until the sandwiches golden brown and the cheese melts. Serve. Place the sandwiches on a serving plate. Cut into pieces, if desired. Enjoy!
